heading: Where giving back is fun!
hero_body: Join UCSF in celebrating our community while fostering a cause you believe in. UCSF events play an essential role in raising awareness and funding for our priority areas.

events.title: Give Breast Cancer the Boot!
events.copy_text: Put your boots on and show your support! Give Breast Cancer the Boot provides vital funding enhancing the quality of care for our patients.

ctas.text: Ready to attend bespoke UCSF events?

give_to_full: Your support is the foundation for our greatest innovations in research, education, and patient care.
